mapper.select: SELECT NID,NTITLE,NCONTENT,NHITS,NDATE, nfile, nsfile FROM GGA_NOTICE WHERE NID=#{nid}
mapper.insert: insert into gga_notice(nid, ntitle, ncontent, nhits, ndate, nfile, nsfile) values('n_'||ltrim(to_char(sequ_gga_notice_nid.nextval,'0000')), #{ntitle}, #{ncontent}, 0, sysdate, #{nfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{nsfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select rownum rno, ntitle, nhits, ndate, nid from (select ntitle, nhits, ndate, nid from gga_notice order by ndate desc)
mapper.update: update gga_notice set ntitle=#{ntitle}, ncontent=#{ncontent} where nid=#{nid}
update gga_notice set nhits = nhits+1 where nid=#{nid}
mapper.select: select nid, ntitle, ncontent, nhits, ndate from gga_notice where ntitle like #{ntitle}
